alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 3:55PM AKST until November 21 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches possible. * WHERE...Skagway and the Klondike Highway. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM AKST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Wednesday morning through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Wednesday through Thursday event will be driven by a strong front advancing N through the area. Confidence in greater snow totals is highest for White Pass and the Klondike Highway and lower for Skagway. Snow totals could fluctuate considerably, as temperatures could prove warmer than anticipated should insufficient outflow be present.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
